events.message: I received my order yesterday but the product was completely different from what I ordered. I want to return it and get a full refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on customer stating they want to return the wrong product and get money back.
Assigning the case to the refunds specialist team for further handling and response.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return your order and receive a refund. I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and some photos of the product you received so we can verify the issue and process your refund?
Here is my order number 123456789 and attached are the photos showing the incorrect item I received instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the return process immediately and issue a full refund once we receive the returned product. We will also send you a prepaid shipping label.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate you sending the prepaid label and processing my refund quickly.
We have received your returned item and processed your refund. You should see the amount credited back to your original payment method shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Since your refund was processed successfully and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
